text: why do i have random scratches on me?

paraphrases.text: Why do I find random scratches on me?
What is the reason of random scratches on me?
How come I have random scratches on me?

qpairs.question: I keep waking up with random scratches on my body, please help?
qpairs.answer: Have you ever been told you sleep walk if so that might be why, I recommend recording your self when you sleep and watching it in fast coward mode to see of you do something.
qpairs.simplified_answer: If you have ever been told you sleepwalk that might be why, I recommend recording yourself when you sleep and watching it in fast mode to see if you do something.
qpairs.summarized_answer: You may be a sleepwalker. Record yourself while sleeping and then watch later to see what happens.

qpairs.question: Itching bumps and scratches what could it be?
qpairs.answer: From eczema to herpes, so see a doctor for correct diagnosis and treatment.
qpairs.simplified_answer: From eczema to herpes, so see a doctor for correct diagnosis and treatment.
qpairs.summarized_answer: From eczema to herpes, so see a doctor for correct diagnosis and treatment.
